title: Good Bath Day!
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Fwaaaaaah.... That feels good~. It’s like I’m melting~~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>The water is really good, right~. I can stay here forever~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>But, Mari-chan, why do you want to go to a hot spring all of a sudden?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Actually, I went to this secret hot spring deep in the mountains with Umi the other day.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Secret hot spring?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Yes! A steep cliff surrounded by the green forest as far as the eye can see, and a clear blue sky! It was the best~. I’ve been really into hot springs since then.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufufu, that seems fun. I kind of want to go there too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Really!? Mari has also been thinking of going there again~! We have to climb for a bit, but after that hardship, the feeling of the hot spring will be the best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Mountain climbing huh.... I guess I’m also interested in that. Let’s invite everyone there!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>That’s a nice idea! Let’s do that! But for now.... Let’s enjoy this hot spring we’re at. We’ll get some mikan juice after the bath!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
